title: alpha client
body: guys i did i request to go at aplha client and the noftication came but i was busy and i pressed X and no download now  . Now how to find the  link or something to join at alpha client ?

replies.body:
I can confirm that the link that *God Fishy* provided should work for you. Alternatively, you should see a download prompt every time you log in to the regular client.

Let me know if you have any questions.

here is the download link, just download and log in :)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download

Sincerely TGFantasy
